statements: DELETE FROM genomics_data WHERE pathway_activity = TRUE
DELETE FROM genomics_data WHERE gene_name = 'TP53' AND pathway_name = 'Apoptosis'
DELETE FROM genomics_data WHERE gene_expression > 5 AND pathway_activity = TRUE
DELETE FROM GenomicsData WHERE gene_id = 10 AND pathway_id = 5;
DELETE FROM drug_targets WHERE pathway_id = 2 AND target_id IN (5, 6);
DELETE FROM drug WHERE drug_id = 5 AND target_gene_id = 10;
